title: A Child's place
creator_credit: British Broadcasting Corporation, Dick Foster and Eurfron Gwynne Jones
brief_description:
Episode of Series “Parents and Children”.
Looks at the system of daycare for young children in Israel, USSR, China and Sweden.The film asks “Where are the children? Who are they with? and what are they doing?”.
creator_credit_for_label: British Broadcasting Corporation, Dick Foster and Eurfron Gwynne Jones
